content.title: Intro
content.content:
1978 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar

Publication Information

Illustrator	The Brothers Hildebrandt
Publisher	Ballantine Books (UK)
Released	1977
Format	Stapled calendar with mailer (13 x 121⁄4 inches)
ISBN	345-25689-1-595
Preceded by	1977 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar
Followed by	None. Next calendar:
The 1980 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar

1978 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar was the official Tolkien calendar published by Ballantine Books in 1977. It features art by The Brothers Hildebrandt based on The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.

content.title: Illustrations
content.content:
Cover - "Legolas and Gimli"
January - "Farmer Maggot's Hospitality"
February - "Old Man Willow"
March - "The Gift of Galadriel"
April - "The Pillars of the Kings"
May - "Gollum"
June - "The Return of Gandalf"
Centrefold - "At the Grey Havens"
July - "Saruman and the Palantir"
August - "The Golden Hall of Rohan"
September - "Beorn the Berserker"
October - "King Theoden and Wormtongue"
November - "Shelob"
December - "The Dark Tower"

content.content: The Silmarillion Calendar 1978, published in the UK
